doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Kalu Arachchillage Harsha Kumari Kaluarachchi and Another Vs The Divisional Secretary and Others before Hon. S.U.B. Karalliyadde, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Kalu Arachchillage Harsha Kumari Kaluarachchi and Another Vs The Divisional Secretary and Others
latest_doc_d.keywords: Grant, Section 19(4) and 104 of the Land Development Ordinance, cancelation of a Grant, Writ of mandamus, legal right
latest_doc_d.legistation: The Land Development Ordinance, No. 19 of 1935 (as amended) and the Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
